entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clear. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
